body_html:
Closing this as both issues have been fixed in version 0.11 (although a ValueError is given instead of an IndexError)

t = tf.ones([2, 3])
t[4, 0]
# ValueError: slice index 4 of dimension 0 out of bounds.

It was probably caceb02f75ff80a8e48440720cec3d7d6fa3297e that fixed it.
body_text:

body:
Closing this as both issues have been fixed in version 0.11 (although a ValueError is given instead of an IndexError)

``` python
t = tf.ones([2, 3])
t[4, 0]
# ValueError: slice index 4 of dimension 0 out of bounds.
```

It was probably `caceb02f75ff80a8e48440720cec3d7d6fa3297e` that fixed it.
